ygData.subject: RE: RE: Stuff from Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: well first the scryer has to spawn, which is maybe 25 to 33% of the time in that spot.  then he has to have the orb, which is very rare.  he usually carries a
ygData.messageBody:
well first the scryer has to spawn, which is maybe 25 to 33% of the time in
that spot. then he has to have the orb, which is very rare. he usually
carries a bracelet of woven grass, a nice caster item. much like the warden
usually carries elf-hide gloves, with the troll-hide belt being very rare
(sob).

Shada
